name: PHP Mess Detector
description: PHPMD linter for Panic's Nova editor.

config.title: Standard
config.description: The coding standard PHPMD should use for linting [cleancode, codesize, controversial, design, naming, unusedcode]. If specifying multiple standards, list them as comma-separated values. You can also specify a workspace-relative or absolute path to a phpcs.xml configuration file. If you do not provide a standard, PHPMD will look for 'phpmd.xml' at the workspace path. If neither is provided, PHPMD will fall back to 'cleancode,codesize,controversial,design,naming,unusedcode'.

config.title: Debugging
config.description: Show debug logs in Extension Console.
